title: My Brilliant Career (CRS056)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that Julio Torres first shared on the podcast in September of 2016 about the side jobs he took before his career took off.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Julio Torres)
